item.title: 基本功能：数学公式
item.description:
对数学公式进行一些测试。 来源： Markdown数学公式指导手册 MathJax basic tutorial and quick reference 行内公式 质能方程：$E=mc^2$。欧拉方程：$e^{i\pi}+1=0$。 块级公式 麦克斯韦方程组： $$  egin{aligned} 
abla \cdot \vec{E} &=  rac{ho}{\varepsilon_0} \ 
abla \cdot \vec{B} &= 0 \ 
abla 	imes \vec{E} &= - rac{\partial \vec{B}}{\partial t} \ 
abla 	imes \vec{B} &= \mu_0 \left(\vec{J} + \varepsilon_0  rac{\partial \vec{E}}{\partial t}ight) \end{aligned} $$ $$\left.  rac{{m d}u}{{m d}x} ight| _{x=0}$$ 公式编号 公式编号： $$  egin{aligned} 	ext{公式1} & = \int_{a}^{b} f(x) dx \label{eq1} \ 	ext{公式2} & = \int_{a}^{b} g(x) dx \end{aligned} $$

item.title: 关于
item.description: Our website builds with Hugo static site generator and Mainroad theme. This demo allows you to see what Mainroad based website looks like before deciding to go with it. Just keep in mind that the current demo shows the basics, a small part of what the combination of Hugo and Mainroad can do. 关于作者 Mainroad is a responsive, simple, clean and content-focused Hugo theme based on the MH Magazine lite WordPress theme
